moves.name: Draining Kiss
moves.description: The user steals the target's energy with a kiss. The user's HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Perish Song
moves.description: Any Pokémon that hears this song faints in three turns, unless it switches out of battle.

moves.name: Pound
moves.description: The target is physically pounded with a long tail or a foreleg, etc.

moves.name: Lick
moves.description: The target is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Lovely Kiss
moves.description: With a scary face, the user tries to force a kiss on the target. If it succeeds, the target falls asleep.

moves.name: Powder Snow
moves.description: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. It may also freeze the targets.

moves.name: Lick
moves.description: The target is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Lovely Kiss
moves.description: With a scary face, the user tries to force a kiss on the target. If it succeeds, the target falls asleep.

moves.name: Powder Snow
moves.description: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. It may also freeze the targets.

moves.name: Double Slap
moves.description: The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Ice Punch
moves.description: The target is punched with an icy fist. It may also leave the target frozen.

moves.name: Heart Stamp
moves.description: The user unleashes a vicious blow after its cute act makes the target less wary. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Mean Look
moves.description: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.

moves.name: Fake Tears
moves.description: The user feigns crying to fluster the target, harshly lowering its Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Wake-Up Slap
moves.description: This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. It also wakes the target up, however.

moves.name: Avalanche
moves.description: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the target in the same turn.

moves.name: Body Slam
moves.description: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Wring Out
moves.description: The user powerfully wrings the target. The more HP the target has, the greater this attack's power.

moves.name: Perish Song
moves.description: Any Pokémon that hears this song faints in three turns, unless it switches out of battle.

moves.name: Blizzard
moves.description: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike the opposing team. It may also freeze them solid.
